contest-event.event-date:
May 26, 1962 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Carnival [Perkin] Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK 1st Prize £75 + The Daily Express "Challenge Shield" 2nd Prize £50 + The Bell Vue "100 Guineas Challenge Trophy" 3rd Prize £30 4th Prize £15 May 1, 2010, 5:16 p.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 9:31 p.m. 1 Slaithwaite Band Roy Newsome 2 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth 3 Mossley Band Derek Sanderson 4 Stretford Band H. Aldcroft Unknown Result Langwith Miners Welfare George Thorpe Unknown Result Linthwaite Silver Band John Willie Morley Unknown Result Whitwell Brass Band J. Bright Unknown Result West Bromwich Borough G. A. Morris Unknown Result City of Birmingham Band A. Harvey Unknown Result Yorkshire Evening Post Band Peter Kitson Unknown Result 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch Unknown Result Dinnington Colliery Band Joe Armstrong
